title: Thursday Post Show (09-16-21)
itunes:title: Thursday Post Show (09-16-21)
description:
Bobby starts with a list of long movies that are worth their runtime. Lunchbox thinks Bobby needs to go gamble with Vegas to show off to his wife. Bobby talks about having several COVID tests after going to the Arkansas game over the weekend. Raymundo also gives tips for artists on how to get their song on the radio. Bobby also gives insight into what he thinks the future of the radio show is.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
